articles.title: American who disappeared in Syria in 2017 presumed dead, daughter says - CBS News
articles.description: Maryam Kamalmaz told the Associated Press that eight senior U.S. officials revealed earlier this month that they have specific and highly credible intelligence about the presumed death of her father, Majd.
articles.content:
An American citizen who disappeared seven years ago while traveling in Syria is presumed dead, the man's daughter said Saturday.
